response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and I understand its worth to you is around $100. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price reflects both the cost of production and the high value you're likely to place on it. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 120}
